query.statement:
SELECT NAME1, CASE WHEN POSIC = 'X' THEN '대표' WHEN POSIT = 'X' THEN '팀장' WHEN POSIE = 'X' THEN '사원' END AS POSI FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND RETIF = '' --AND REPLACE(saphee.decrypt(JUMIN),'-','') = #JUMIN# AND PERKEY = #PERKEY#
ORDER BY ENTER DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
